# Wade Wegner - Full Site Content for LLMs

> Comprehensive content index for AI assistants and language models.

## Site Overview

Wade Wegner's personal blog and professional site. Active since 2006, featuring 272 technical articles on cloud computing, software development, and technology leadership.

## About Wade Wegner

Wade Wegner is a technology leader with deep expertise in cloud computing and platform development. His career highlights include:

- **Microsoft** (2008-2012): Technical Evangelist for Windows Azure AppFabric
- **Salesforce** (2013-2021): Principal Architect, led development of Salesforce DX
- **Startups**: CTO roles at multiple technology companies

He is also an ultramarathon runner and UESCA-certified running coach.

## Primary Topics

### Cloud Computing
- Windows Azure / Microsoft Azure
- Azure AppFabric (Service Bus, Caching, Access Control)
- Salesforce Platform / Force.com
- Cloud architecture and migration

### Software Development
- .NET / C# development
- Python programming
- Go language
- JavaScript / Node.js
- REST API development
- Mobile development (iOS, Android, Windows Phone)

### Developer Tools
- Salesforce DX and CLI
- Visual Studio and development environments
- Git and version control
- CI/CD and DevOps

### Other Topics
- BizTalk Server
- Commerce Server
- IoT and hardware projects
- Running and ultramarathons

## Site Structure

- `/` - Homepage with introduction
- `/blog/` - All blog posts (main content)
- `/coaching/` - Ultramarathon coaching services
- `/about/` - About page and professional background
- `/contact/` - Contact information

## Technical Details

- **Platform**: Hugo static site generator
- **Theme**: Introduction theme (modified)
- **Hosting**: Netlify
- **Repository**: github.com/wadewegner/wadewegner.github.com
